data.text:
Whatcombe Road in Frome will be closed to service D2 between 16:00 and 19:00 (three hours) on Saturday 17th August to facilitate a street party.

Services will be diverted via Vallis Road and Christchurch Street West to serve the Market Place bus stop in the correct direction.

----

For more information please contact our Customer Services Department

Telephone: 0345 646 0707 (Calls cost 12p per minute plus network charges)

Customer service contact us

Postal address: First Bus, Enterprise House, Easton Road, Bristol, BS5 0DZ

Long term closure of the A36 at Limpley Stoke

From Monday 12th August, the A36 at Limpley Stoke will be closed until Spring 2025 while repairs to the road take place. Service D2x will be unable to use the A36, and due to the low bridge at Midford, double deck buses cannot use the B3110.

Instead, the D2x will operate after Frome Market Place via Welshmill Road, Welshmill Lane, Whatcombe Road, Buckland Dinham, Radstock, Peasedown St John (serving Orchard Way) and Dunkerton to and from Bath. Journey times have been revised, but the duration is similar to before.

The new timetable and route map for the D2/D2x from 12th August 2024 can be seen attached below.

Clink, Beckington, Woolverton, the A36, Limpley Stoke, Bathampton and the Grand Parade area of Bath City Centre will not be served by the D2x.

The D2 will be unchanged and continue to operate its usual route - however please be aware that there is a timetable change due from 1st September as part of our service changes, please click here for more information.

Street Road in Compton Dundon (B3151) will be closed to services 77 and 77a between 09:30 and 15:30 from Monday 12th through to Friday 16th August to facilitate carriageway works.

Services will be diverted via Reynalds way and the B3153 to resume in both directions.

Regretfully no bus stops will be served between the junction of Reynalds way and Littleton Hill will be served and passengers are advised to board or alight at the Marshalls Elm, Collards Hill bus stops just prior to Reynalds Way or the Somerton Lynch House bus stops on the B3153 or the Somerton Dower bus stops on the B3151.

----

For more information please contact our Customer Services Department

Telephone: 0345 646 0707 (Calls cost 12p per minute plus network charges)

Customer service contact us

Postal address: First Bus, Enterprise House, Easton Road, Bristol, BS5 0DZ

Silver Street in Nailsea will be closed to service X7 between 08:00 and 17:00 from Monday 5th through to Friday 23rd August (excluding weekends) to facilitate carriageway works.

Service X7 heading towards Clevedon will operate normal route to the junction of Stock Way North and Clevedon Road, then turn right into Clevedon Road to resume normal route at the junction of Pound Lane.

Service X7 heading towards Bristol will operate the reverse of the above.

Regretfully the bus stops between and including Christ Church on Silver Street and Ravenswood School on Pound Lane will not be served and passengers are advised to board or alight at either the Southfield Road bus stops on Clevedon Road (diversion route) or the Stock Way North bus stop heading towards Clevedon or the Link Road bus stop heading towards Bristol.

----

For more information, please contact our Customer Services Department

Telephone: 0345 646 0707 (Calls cost 12p per minute plus network charges)

Customer service contact us

The full length of Station Road in New Cheltenham will be closed overnight to service 7 between 19:30 and 06:00 from Tuesday 13th through to Wednesday 21st August (excluding weekends) to facilitate resurfacing works.

Service 7 heading towards Staple HIll after serving the Siston Common Roundabout bus stop on Anchor Road will be diverted via Pound Road and Pool Road to resume normal route at Morley Road,

Hutton Hill in the village of Hutton is currently closed to service 126 until further notice due to a landslide. The closure is for unknown duration and when details of re-opening have been confirmed the web page will be updated.

Service 126 heading towards Wells will divert via Moor Lane, Moor Croft Road and Vereland Road, resuming normal route at Hutton Hill (Part unaffected). The only bus stop missed out fully will be the Primary School stop, however for customers travelling towards Wells, at the bus stops along the diversion route you will need to wait for the bus on the opposite side of the road to normal.

Service 126 heading towards Weston is unaffected and will follow normal route.
